Uses of BMLElement in de.dfki.embots.bml.sync
 

Subclasses of BMLElement in de.dfki.embots.bml.sync
 class BMLRelativeSyncPoint
          Constraint that points to another constraint, e.g.
 class BMLSpeechSyncPoint
           
 class BMLSyncPoint
          Sync points can be one of the standard BML sync points (start, ready, stroke_start etc.) or a specifically defined time point in the speech stream (with ).
 class BMLVirtualSyncPoint
          Virtual sync points are inserted because they are pointed to from some other sync point or are used to express behavior-internal constraints.
